channel.title: Server Status Page........WITH FLASH!
channel.description:
Ok, we know that status pages have been made right? Almost all of them are done in basic php scripting. I wanted to change it up a bit by adding FLASH into the equation. [code]
Server Name
 
IP Address
 
Current Status
 
SERVER NAME(Official)
SERVER IP
OFFLINE"; //When server status is offline, output this } else { echo " "; //Else, output this } ?>
[/code] To prove it: http://www.h4ckers-network.com/test3.php that is the one i was working on. If you want your server added Email h4ckers_network@hotmail.com

item.title: Server Status Page........WITH FLASH!
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

Ok, we know that status pages have been made right? Almost all of them are done in basic php scripting. I wanted to change it up a bit by adding FLASH into the equation.

[code]

Server Name  IP Address  Current Status 
SERVER NAME(Official) SERVER IP <?php $ip = "SERVER IP"; //put your ipaddress here if (! $sock = @fsockopen($ip, "PORTNUMBER", $num, $error, 5)) //Checks the server's status (43594 = port) { echo "OFFLINE"; //When server status is offline, output this } else { echo " "; //Else, output this } ?>
[/code]

To prove it: http://www.h4ckers-network.com/test3.php
that is the one i was working on. If you want your server added Email h4ckers_network@hotmail.com

Read full topic
